Description: Top Floor spacious 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom plus office features, private deck, central AC, in unit washer and dryer, hardwood floors, gas fireplace, tall ceilings and oversized kitchen & living room. Chefs kitchen with island and breakfast bar. Primary bedroom has custom closet and ensuite full bathroom. Exceptional apartment in sought after East Side location. No smoking, no pets, Available for 9/1/23
